content.text: I'm a single parent of two. I'm a teacher, and I love cooking. What's your favorite food?
I love pizza! I'm also a musician. I play the guitar and I love to sing.
That's really cool! I like to go to the beach, and I love taking my dog to the dog park.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! What's your dog's name?
His name is Marley. What's your favorite hobby?
I love to make my own art. I'm going to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art.
That's really awesome! I love to cook, and I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting.
I love to try new recipes, too! I'm always looking for new ways to use my favorite ingredients.
What do you think of the school system today?
I think it's important to have a strong education system, and I'm glad that you're a teacher.
Thank you! I think it's important to give kids a good foundation, so they can be successful in life.
I agree! I want my baby to have a great education
